downloadTitle: Windows Server 2012 Hyper-V Component Architecture Poster and Companion References
downloadDescription: Provides a visual reference for understanding key Hyper-V technologies in Windows Server 2012 and focuses on Hyper-V Replica, networking, virtual machine mobility (live migration), storage, failover clustering, and scalability.

downloadFile.name: Windows Server 2012 Hyper-V Component Architecture Poster.pdf

detailsSection:
This poster and and the companion references provide an understanding about key Hyper-V technologies in Windows Server 2012. The Hyper-V poster focuses on Hyper-V Replica, networking, virtual machine mobility (live migration), storage, failover clustering, and scalability. For posters related to earlier operating systems, see:
  • Windows Server 2008 R2 with SP1 Hyper-V Component Architecture (http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=2688)
  • Windows Server 2008 R2 Hyper-V Component Architecture (http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3501)
  • Windows Server 2008 R2 Feature Component Poster (http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=7002)
  • Windows Server 2008 Component Posters (http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17881)

systemRequirementsSection: Web browser and any application capable of displaying PDF files.
installInstructionSection:
• To start the download, click the Download button, and then do one of the following:
    • To start the download immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for viewing at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the download, click Cancel.
